original_text: The workers fixed pieces of cloth on the two edges of the ephod. These pieces went over the priest's shoulders to join the front and the back parts of the ephod.
korean_text: 에봇에는 어깨받이를 만들어 그 두 끝에 달아 서로 연결되게 하고

sentences.original_text: The workers fixed pieces of cloth
on the two edges of the ephod
These pieces went over the priest's shoulders
sentences.korean_translation: 이 천 조각들은 제사장의 어깨 위로 뻗어갔습니다

sentences.original_text: to join the front and the back parts of the ephod
